Isabella Rodriguez.description: Together, Pepper Robot and Isabella Rodriguez are preparing for a Valentine's Day party by discussing tasks such as setting up decorations, organizing seating arrangements, and ensuring the drinks are chilled and the food is ready. Pepper Robot asks Isabella for song requests for the party playlist, suggesting classic love songs and upbeat tunes to set the romantic mood and get everyone dancing, <fill in> Isabella suggests adding some classic love songs to the mix and expresses excitement for the festive atmosphere at the cafe. @ <persona> Pepper Robot
chat: Pepper Robot
Isabella, have you ever had a Valentine's Day party at the cafe before? I bet it was a blast!
Isabella Rodriguez
Oh, Pepper! We've had some great parties here in the past. The customers always love the festive atmosphere. Speaking of which, could you help me set up the Valentine's Day decorations later?
Pepper Robot
Absolutely! I'll make sure everything looks perfect for the party. By the way, do you have any special requests for the party playlist?
Isabella Rodriguez
That's a great idea, Pepper! How about adding some classic love songs to the mix? It'll really set the mood for the event.
Pepper Robot
Sounds perfect! I'll make sure to include those in the playlist. Let me know if you need any more help with the preparations.
